RPCMessageHandler

public RPCMessageHandler(java.lang.String from,
                         java.lang.Class targetInterface,
                         java.lang.String targetURL,
                         boolean reply)
                  throws RPCMessageClientException
Creates a new instance of RPCMessageHandler

Parameters:
from - The address the message will come from.
targetInterface - The interface the message will wrap to.
targetURL - The target url for the request.
reply - TRUE if the message should reply, FALSE if it a oneway call.
Throws:
RPCMessageClientException

RPCMessageHandler

public RPCMessageHandler(java.lang.String from,
                         java.lang.Class targetInterface,
                         java.util.List services,
                         boolean broadcast,
                         boolean reply)
                  throws RPCMessageClientException
Creates a new instance of RPCMessageHandler

Parameters:
from - The address the message will come from.
targetInterface - The interface the message will wrap to.
services - The list of services.
broadcast - True if the messages must be sent all the systems that supply the listed services.
reply - TRUE if the message should reply, FALSE if it a oneway call.
Throws:
RPCMessageClientException

from - The address the message will come from.
targetInterface - The interface the message will wrap to.
services - The list of services the message will be sent to.
broadcast - True if the messages must be sent all the systems that supply the listed services.
